Weekly News

This page includes current announcements at First Baptist. This is the same information that is found in the weekly bulletin.

Sunday Bible Study

  • Early Sunday School: Sundays, 9:15 AM (Intergenerational Class)
  • Late Sunday School: Sundays, 10:15 AM (Bykota) & 10:45 AM (Two by Two, Friendship, and an Intergenerational Class)

Children’s Church

Children’s Church is during the Late Worship Gathering. Children’s Church is for children in kindergarten through 2nd grade. The children are dismissed before the sermon to the basement classroom for their worship time.

Softball Game

The next game will be 7 PM, Monday, July 14 at the Muncie Sportsplex. We will be facing University Christian. The games are a lot of fun. Come out and support the team.

Vacation Bible School

We are very excited to announce that FBC Muncie will be having its own VBS this year! If you have children K-3rd Grade(the grade he/she will be entering in the fall), make sure to save the date for the Savannah Safari the week of Sunday, July 13-Thursday, July 17. We will be providing dinner for families at 5:30 PM, then VBS is from 6-8 PM. We will be teaching the children about helping and encouraging others, and some of our activities will even involve doing things for the community. This is an awesome opportunity for your little ones.

Missional Communities

The Missional Communities are on a two-month break (June-July). Life groups may continue to meet for fellowship during the summer months. However, no social events or service projects are scheduled for June/July. Group leaders use this time to evaluate and plan for the coming session. The fall session will begin in August. If you are interested in joining a life group in the fall session, let Wade or a life group leader know. Please keep leaders in your prayers this summer as they discern direction for the fall.

Youth at Camp Barnabas

The youth served last week in Purdy, MO at Camp Barnabas. Camp Barnabas offers life-changing opportunities to people with special needs and chronic diseases. You can see all the pictures from the week at .

Financial Reports

Financial Reports and CCT Meeting Summaries are available in the church office on the receptionist's desk.

Church Business Meeting

The CCT is bringing a motion to hire Clifton Davis as Interim Minister of Worship. There will be a church wide business meeting on Sunday, July 13, 2014 (following each service) to consider this motion to hire Clifton Davis on a six month contract.

Visitor and Bulletin Information

If you would like to place an announcement in the church bulletin please email it to . If you have an article for the August newsletter, please email it to by Sunday, July 20.

Scam Prevention Workshop

At 2:00 PM on Tuesday, July 15 at Riverside Avenue Baptist Church the joint FBC/RABC will host Michelle Mayer of the Indiana Attorney General’s Office. She will speaking on scams and frauds. She was the well received speaker at the Senior Adult Day in Columbus. Come and learn how to protect yourself. Other churches in the area have been made aware of this opportunity. There will be no charge.

Open Door Food Distribution

On Wednesday, July 23, Open Door Ministries will be passing out food to needy families from 7:30-9:30 AM. If you know of someone who could use help with food, please let Duane Davis know. If you have a group (SS Class, Mission Circle, or Life Group) that would like to help distribute food, please contact James Martin ( or ).

    About Us

    First Baptist Church Muncie has a rich history, but is also a forward looking, ministry-oriented congregation.
    First Baptist is located at 309 E. Adams Street, Muncie, IN 47396, Phone: 765-284-7749
